info.name: 8chan/Infinity - Solarized Light
info.description: A style changing the colorscheme of 8chan to fit the Solarized Light color palette. May have unfinished parts (e.g. error messages, bans), but most browsing is covered by the style.
info.additionalInfo: 0.1 - Initial style 0.2 - Ironed out some loose ends, made postform ths pretty Thanks to Ethan Schoonover for creating Solarized.
